credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: A seated bishop
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium:
recto: pen and brown ink (iron gall ink); verso: red chalk 
cream laid paper
description: Vertically oriented; in pontifical attire, turned toward left. Above is a cross which leads to the assumption that this project was chosen to be executed. At the reverse is part of a red crayon drawing. "g 60" written horizontally, above at the right edge.
name: Drawing
